reviews.comment: It would be fantastic if someone made a good full length platformer. I\'d pay. $10 for a good one with good touch and/or accelerometer controls like RI
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great! Only 2 problems.
reviews.comment: This is great all around! There\'s only 2 things I would fix. I would like you guys to make the keyboard controls W A S D not D Z X C. Also I would like you to make the on screen controls disappear when using the keyboard. That is all but I recommend this game to everyone to get this great Rpg/Adventure game!!
reviews.author: Reina Amparo

reviews.title: i love this game but..
reviews.comment: just wish the full version was free as well u dont really get to do a whole lot in the game before it wants u to buy the full version. make a free full version and will definately rate 5 stars! overall great game though
reviews.author: jillian evans

reviews.comment: I\'m surprise the developers haven\'t been sued yet. I\'ve purchase the paid version 2 days ago and still nothing. I should\'ve stuck with the iPhone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The \"free version\" is nothing more then an extremely short trial version. You get forced to pay to continue playing after the 1st couple missions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No sale!
reviews.comment: No SD card support (which should be mandatory!), no Xperia Play support (despite saying keyboard support!) equals no sale. Looks interesting but until this is fixed, Im not even prepared to download the free game to try.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Text takes forever to read because it\'s so slow and if you click it disappears before you can read it all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Boringggggggg after lv 35..... waste my time and ppls money playing the paid version although i download free for the paid version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is stupid. I thought its a full game with only annoying ad. But its just a stupid demo. Lousy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool game, appreciate keyboard support, but need to be able to remap keys; doesn\'t work well with my keys
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it. Loads better than Zenonia cos of graphics. Im on the Galaxy Apollo n its playing fine. Wish we could pay for full version via phone bill!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesomeness!!!!! =D Buying full version now.....way better than zanonia or w/e its called.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Takes way too much to kill the monsters. Hitting them and taking one point away they hit me and take away 96 to 160 at a time is unfair and ridiculous
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cheap
reviews.comment: Fee version is just a ruse to get you to buy full version. It randomly stops you on certain key quests and you have no choice but to lose all progress if you don\'t buy the game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wont run.
reviews.comment: Playing on my samsung galaxy tablet 10.1. Please fix so i can play this game. It looks amazing and would like to change my rating very soon!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Game is awesome, would rate 5 stars and buy full version if the controls weren\'t so difficult
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes on Nexus 7 :(
reviews.comment: Gave an average cuz it works on my phone but crashes on nexus 7
reviews.author: Joey Albert Abano

reviews.comment: Like the big sprites I spoze but no jumping? No alternate attack? I feel like I\'m playing a game on an old Atati one button joystick.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I really like how this game is set up, unfortunately the demo is short. Multitouch would be great as well. MT3GS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Game quietly force closes and freezes. Otherwise game is super cool for the money. Atrix support please!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
